MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML8 postcode area of Carluke, affecting properties in Sandy Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.17am. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our engineers have discovered an underground cable fault close to the Stewart Street substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.07pm on the 26th of February 2021.
